result.execSummary:
The defendant Jessie W Reyes Fleischmann was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
In lieu of payment of DNA surcharge and court costs, defendant to serve 8 days jail.  Apply 8 days sentence credit.  TIME SERVED.  PAID IN FULL.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Straight Time.
Apply 15 days sentence credit.
TIME SERVED.
